str2: On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To live a luxurious life, live self-indulgently. From truphe; to indulge in luxury.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To live extravagantly, luxuriously; To be wanton. From spatale; to be voluptuous.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to stiffen, i.e. Fatten (with food, etc.), pamper, rear).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
Slaughter, sacrifice. From sphazo; butchery (figuratively) of men (destruction).
